mapper.insert: insert into comment (comment_text, postId, userId, createTime, flag) values (#{commentText}, #{postId}, #{userId}, #{createtime}, #{flag});
mapper.select: select `comment`.id, `comment`.comment_text, `comment`.postId, user.avatar as userAvatar, user.`name`, `comment`.createTime from comment LEFT JOIN user on `comment`.userId = `user`.id where comment.postId = #{id}

select `comment`.id, `comment`.comment_text, `comment`.postId, user.id as userId, user.avatar as userAvatar, user.`name`, `comment`.createTime from comment LEFT JOIN user on `comment`.userId = `user`.id where comment.postId = #{id} limit #{page}, #{pageSize}

select comment.id, post_user.avatar AS userAvatar, post.title, comment.postId, comment.comment_text, comment.createTime from user LEFT JOIN comment ON user.id = comment.userId LEFT JOIN post ON comment.postId = post.id LEFT JOIN user AS post_user ON post.userid = post_user.id WHERE user.id = #{userId} and post.flag != 0;
